alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Mills (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 7:21PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hamilton and northeastern Mills Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 720 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles northeast of Goldthwaite, or 18 miles southwest of Hamilton, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shive, Center City, Pecan Wells, Indian Gap, Pottsville, and Caradan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
